properties.entry: SELECT LESSON_NO,LESSON_TITLE,LESSON_CONTENT,PLACE,PRICE,MAX_NUM,LESSON_DT ,LESSON_CNT, LESSON_TIME,LESSON_TYPE,MEMBER_NO,PAYMENT_CK FROM PAYMENT INNER JOIN LESSON USING(LESSON_NO)
SELECT LESSON_TITLE,LESSON_CONTENT,PLACE,PRICE,MAX_NUM,LESSON_DT ,LESSON_CNT, LESSON_TIME,LESSON_TYPE,MEMBER_NO,PAYMENT_CK FROM PAYMENT INNER JOIN LESSON USING(LESSON_NO) WHERE LESSON_NO= ?
